name: elemgame-random
description: A simple and fair way to randomly select one item from a list

scripts.deploy-local: npm run local-net && locklift run --network local --script scripts/1-deploy-random.ts
scripts.deploy-test: npm run deploy-test-random && npm run verify-test
scripts.deploy-main: npm run deploy-main-random && npm run verify-main
scripts.test: npm run local-net && locklift test --network test

author: Ever Guild
